alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Vinton (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 07 at 8:27AM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Jackson and northwestern Vinton Counties through 900 AM EDT... At 827 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles east of Waverly, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Wellston, Hamden, Coalton, Byer and Allensville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
